contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox block cipher | name = DEAL | image = [[Image:Deal-round-function.svg|200px|center]] | caption = Round function of DEAL | designers = [[Lars Knudsen]] | publish date = 1998 | derived from = [[Data Encryption Standard|DES]] | derived to = | related to = [[Ladder-DES]] | key size = 128, 192 or 256 bits | block size = 128 bits | structure = Nested [[Feistel network]] | rounds = 6 (128- and 192-bit key) or 8 (256-bit key) | cryptanalysis = }} In [[cryptography]], '''DEAL''' ('''Data Encryption Algorithm with Larger blocks''') is a [[block cipher]] derived from the [[Data Encryption Standard]] (DES). The design was proposed in a report by [[Lars Knudsen]] in 1998, and was submitted to the [[AES contest]] by [[Richard Outerbridge]] (who notes that Knudsen had presented the design at the [[Selected Areas in Cryptography|SAC]] conference in 1997). DEAL is a [[Feistel network]] which uses [[Data Encryption Standard|DES]] as the round function. It has a 128-bit [[block size (cryptography)|block size]] and a variable [[key size]] of either 128, 192, or 256 bits. For key sizes of 128 and 192 bits, the cipher uses 6 rounds, increasing to 8 for the 256-bits size. The scheme has a comparable performance to [[Triple DES]], and was relatively slow compared to many other AES candidates. ==See also== * [[Ladder-DES]] * [[Luby-Rackoff]] ==External links== * [http://www.mat.dtu.dk/people/Lars.R.Knudsen/newblock.html The original DEAL report] * [http://www.users.zetnet.co.uk/hopwood/crypto/scan/cs.html#DEAL SCAN's entry for DEAL] * [http://csrc.nist.gov/archive/aes/round1/conf1/deal-slides.pdf AES presentation slides] (PDF) ==References== * {{cite conference | author = [[John Kelsey (cryptanalyst)|John Kelsey]], [[Bruce Schneier]] | title = Key-Schedule Cryptanalysis of DEAL | booktitle = 6th Annual International Workshop on [[Selected Areas in Cryptography]] (SAC '99) | pages = 118–134 | publisher = [[Springer-Verlag]] | date = August 1999 | location = [[Kingston, Ontario]] | url = http://www.schneier.com/paper-deal.html | format = [[PDF]]/[[PostScript]] | accessdate = 2007-08-23 }} * [[Stefan Lucks]]: On Security of the 128-Bit Block Cipher DEAL.
